The researcher of the Qurâ€™an is up to Him: Did you not know that God has the possession of the heavens and the earth and what you have without God from my guardian and no support.In the sense that the king of the heavens and the earth has no other for it, (P-2212), and this is the alert that it is their pursuit and the Almighty, but it is good from it the matter and the end; He has a money for creation, and this is the view of our companions, and that it is good for the seizure of it to the manifestation He gets, or a punishment.Al -Qaflal said: It is inevitable that this is a sign of the kissing matter, for it is the highest that informs them that it is the money of the heavens and the earth, and that the place and the whole of it, and the whole of it, A deprivation of some, except from where he makes it, he is the Almighty, and if it is like that, and the matter was in the righteousness A party to one side, and the guardian and the victory are all of them, in a sense of effective on the face of the vagina, and from the people who inferred this verse on the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is He said first: Did you not know that God is able to do everything and then he said after him: Did you not know that God has the possession of the heavens and the earth, and if the king was from this, the king was from this Frequently, uninterrupted, and the words in the truth of the king and destiny may be presented in his saying: the money of the Day of Religion [Al -Fatihah: 4].
